    Exception Description
    VariableState.CyclicalError
    Thrown by VariableState.ResolveState if a cycle is found.

Package edu.uiuc.ncsa.qdl.state Description

Classes that manage the state of an interpreter session. This includes managing modules, virtual file systems and the symbol table for variables.

Created by Jeff Gaynor
on 3/13/20 at 9:08 AM
